item.title: GenAI Java & Python
item.description: 🎯 What is Generative AI 🧪 Hands-on Demos 📦 Project Ideas - Java & Python 📝 Text Projects 🖼️ Image Projects 🎙️ Voice Projects 🎬 Video Projects ⚙️ Full-Stack Projects 💼 Career Impact 🎯 What is Generative AI ✅ Generative AI enables machines to create text, code, images, and more — not just analyze. ✅ Powered by Large Language Models (LLMs) like GPT, Gemini, and LLaMA. ✅ With your Java/Python background, you can build GenAI apps using APIs, prompts, and lightweight tools.
